titles.title: Supporting the designation of May as "National Lyme Disease Awareness Month".
Supporting the designation of May as "National Lyme Disease Awareness Month".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: Supports the designation of National Lyme Disease Awareness Month to increase public knowledge of the disease, raise awareness about the prevention of tick bites, and advance the vision of finding a cure through critical research.
